name: AHN Mini-Publisher
short_description:
The AHN Mini Publisher is a free, light weight, easy to install news content management system for Linux, Apache, MySQL and Perl CGI.

The mini-publisher news CMS is template based and allows for simplistic role based publishing of text and images.
